mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.create_by AS "createBy.id", a.create_date AS "createDate", a.update_by AS "updateBy.id", a.update_date AS "updateDate", a.remarks AS "remarks", a.del_flag AS "delFlag", a.docid AS "docId", a.sbmc AS "sbmc", a.pp AS "pp", a.xh AS "xh", a.sl AS "sl", a.sbjg AS "sbjg", a.rusynf AS "rusynf"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO ironfo_yjbylsbpz_zyk( id, create_by, create_date, update_by, update_date, remarks, del_flag, docid, zyk_sbmc, zyk_pp, zyk_xh, zyk_sl, zyk_sbjg, zyk_rusynf ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{createBy.id}, #{createDate}, #{updateBy.id}, #{updateDate}, #{remarks}, #{delFlag}, #{docId}, #{zyk_sbmc}, #{zyk_pp}, #{zyk_xh}, #{zyk_sl}, #{zyk_sbjg}, #{zyk_rusynf} )
mapper.update: UPDATE ironfo_yjbylsbpz_zyk SET update_by = #{updateBy.id}, update_date = #{updateDate}, remarks = #{remarks}, docid = #{docId}, zyk_sbmc = #{zyk_sbmc}, zyk_pp = #{zyk_pp}, zyk_xh = #{zyk_xh}, zyk_sl = #{zyk_sl}, zyk_sbjg = #{zyk_sbjg}, zyk_rusynf = #{zyk_rusynf} WHERE id = #{id}
